discussion.author: tp2750
discussion.text:
I'll rename to follow the naming conventions.
Please close this request.

Is there a way to check for similar names before submitting the request?

discussion.author: giordano
discussion.text:
> Is there a way to check for similar names before submitting the request?

CC @ericphanson

discussion.author: ericphanson
discussion.text: Yeah, there is a way to do that, it’s written on https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/blob/1f5e256ce4823c8466df053f3090bee1561b0095/README.md#automatic-merging-of-pull-requests under the bullet point starting with “To prevent confusion...” (you have to scroll down a bit)
